languages.text: "Что ж... за нашу встречу, {name}. Не надо быть семи пядей во лбу, чтобы понять, что вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}человек непростой{/d}, раз удостоились личной встречи с самим Наместником Футфола. Всегда приятно свести знакомство с власть имущими..." {n}Сделав глоток, женщина вдруг замирает — и, решительно отставив стакан в сторону, поворачивается к вам.{/n} "...приятно и к месту".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж... за нашу встречу, {name}. Не надо быть семи пядей во лбу, чтобы понять, что вы человек непростой, раз удостоились личной встречи с самим наместником Футфола. Всегда приятно свести знакомство с власть имущими..." {n}Сделав глоток, женщина вдруг замирает — и, решительно отставив стакан в сторону, поворачивается к вам.{/n} "...приятно и к месту".

languages.text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."
languages.original_text: "Что ж... за нашу встречу, {name}. Не надо быть семи пядей во лбу, чтобы понять, что вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}человек непростой{/d}, раз удостоились личной встречи с самим Наместником Футфола. Всегда приятно свести знакомство с власть имущими..." {n}Сделав глоток, женщина вдруг замирает — и, решительно отставив стакан в сторону, поворачивается к вам.{/n} "...приятно и к месту".

traits.locale_text: "Well, then... to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. Always a pleasure to make acquaintance with the powerful..." {n}She takes a sip, then freezes. Resolutely, she puts the glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "...a very timely pleasure."

"Well, then... to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. Always a pleasure to make acquaintance with the powerful..." {n}She takes a sip, then freezes. Resolutely, she puts the glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "...a very timely pleasure."

"Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

"Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

"Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

languages.text: 「そう…じゃあ、あたしたちの出会いに乾杯、{name}。アンタが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}ただものじゃない{/d}のは誰が見ても明らかだよ。フットフォールの領主本人に謁見を許されたんだもの。権力のある人物と知り合いになれるのは、いつだって大歓迎」{n}彼女は一口飲み、話をやめ…何かを決めたかのようにグラスを横に置き、こちらのほうへ振り返った。{/n}「絶好のタイミングだしね」
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: 「そう…じゃあ、あたしたちの出会いに乾杯、{name}。アンタが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}ただものじゃない{/d}のは誰が見ても明らかだよ。フットフォールの領主本人に謁見を許されたんだもの。権力のある人物と知り合いになれるのは、いつだって大歓迎」{n}彼女は一口飲み、話をやめ…何かを決めたかのようにグラスを横に置き、こちらのほうへ振り返った。{/n}「絶好のタイミングだしね」

languages.text: “那么……为我们的初次见面干杯吧，{name}。任谁都看得出来，你必有{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}过人之处{/d}，否则也不会有机会与落脚港的总督见面了。结交有权有势的朋友总是一件乐事。”{n}她抿了一口杯中的酒，顿了顿……之后毅然放下酒杯，正脸转向你。{/n}“更何况，时机还刚刚好。”
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: “那么……为我们的初次见面干杯吧，{name}。任谁都看得出来，你必有过人之处，否则也不会有机会与落脚港的总督见面了。结交有权有势的朋友总是一件乐事。”{n}她抿了一口杯中的酒，顿了顿……之后毅然放下酒杯，正脸转向你。{/n}“更何况，时机还刚刚好。”

languages.text: « Eh bien... buvons à notre rencontre, {name}. Inutile d'être grand clerc pour comprendre que vous êtes {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}quelqu'un de spécial{/d}, surtout après l'audience qui vous a été accordée par le suzerain de Castel en personne. C'est toujours un plaisir de faire la connaissance de personnalités influentes, » {n}dit-elle en buvant une gorgée, avant de reposer son verre d'un geste résolu pour se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Et vous ne pouviez pas mieux tomber. »
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien... buvons à notre rencontre, {name}. Inutile d'être grand clerc pour comprendre que vous êtes quelqu'un de spécial, surtout après l'audience qui vous a été accordée par le suzerain de Castel en personne. C'est toujours un plaisir de faire la connaissance de personnalités influentes, » {n}dit-elle en buvant une gorgée, avant de reposer son verre d'un geste résolu pour se tourner vers vous.{/n} « Et vous ne pouviez pas mieux tomber. »

languages.text: «Pues... brindo por nuestro encuentro, {name}. No hace falta ser muy avispado para saber que es usted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}alguien especial{/d}, sobre todo cuando ha tenido una audiencia con el mismísimo Señor de Paso. Siempre es un placer conocer a alguien poderoso». {n}Bebe un sorbo, hace una pausa... y deja el vaso aparcado para dirigirse a ti.{/n} «Y el momento no podría ser más oportuno».
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: «Pues... brindo por nuestro encuentro, {name}. No hace falta ser muy avispado para saber que es usted alguien especial, sobre todo cuando ha tenido una audiencia con el mismísimo Señor de Paso. Siempre es un placer conocer a alguien poderoso». {n}Bebe un sorbo, hace una pausa... y deja el vaso aparcado para dirigirse a ti.{/n} «Y el momento no podría ser más oportuno».

languages.text: "Ähm, also ... was unser Treffen angeht, {name}. Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu sehen, dass Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}jemand Besonderes{/d} seid. Immerhin habt Ihr eine Audienz beim Lehnsherrn von Footfall erhalten. Es ist stets ein Vergnügen, die Bekanntschaft einer mächtigen Person zu machen." {n}Sie nippt und hält kurz inne, ehe sie ihr Glas resolut beiseite stellt und sich dir zuwendet.{/n} "Und das Timing könnte besser nicht sein."
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: "Ähm, also ... was unser Treffen angeht, {name}. Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu sehen, dass Ihr was Besonderes seid. Immerhin habt Ihr eine Audienz beim Lehnsherrn von Footfall erhalten. Es ist stets ein Vergnügen, die Bekanntschaft einer mächtigen Person zu machen." {n}Sie nippt und hält kurz inne, ehe sie ihr Glas resolut beiseite stellt und sich dir zuwendet.{/n} "Und das Timing könnte besser nicht sein."

languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, . It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're someone special, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

languages.text: "Peki o hâlde... Tanışmamızın şerefine içelim {name}. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}Önemli birisi{/d} olduğunu anlamak için dâhi olmaya gerek yok, sonuçta sana Binliman Emîri'nin huzuruna çıkma fırsatı verilmiş. Kudretli insanlarla tanışmak benim için daima zevktir." {n}İçkisinden bir yudum alıyor, sonra da duruyor. Ardından kadehini kararlılıkla kenara koyup sana dönüyor.{/n} "Hem de tam zamanında geldin."
languages.original_text: "Well, then... here's to our meeting, {name}. It doesn't take a genius to figure out that you're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}someone special{/d}, since you've been granted an audience with the Liege of Footfall himself. It's always a pleasure to make the acquaintance of someone powerful." {n}She takes a sip, and pauses... then resolutely sets her glass aside and turns to you.{/n} "And the timing couldn't be better."

traits.locale_text: "Peki o hâlde... Tanışmamızın şerefine içelim {name}. Önemli birisi olduğunu çözmek için dâhi olmaya gerek yok, sonuçta sana Binliman Emîri'nin huzuruna çıkma fırsatı verilmiş. Böylesine güçlü birisiyle tanışmak benim için daima bir zevktir." {n}İçkisinden bir yudum alıyor, sonra da duruyor... Ardından, kadehini kararlılıkla bir kenara koyup sana dönüyor.{/n} "Hem de tam zamanında geldin."
